title: Classic Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: A simple yet elegant Italian pasta dish with garlic, olive oil, and a hint of red pepper. Ready in just 20 minutes.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente, about 1 minute less than package directions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add sliced garlic and cook slowly until golden and fragrant, about 3-4 minutes. Be careful not to burn it.
Add red pepper flakes to the oil and stir for 30 seconds.
Add the drained pasta directly to the skillet. Toss vigorously, adding reserved pasta water a little at a time until the sauce emulsifies and coats the pasta.
Remove from heat, add parsley, and toss again. Season with salt to taste.
Serve immediately with freshly grated Parmesan if desired.
